paper.title: On the performance evaluation of extendible hashing and trie searching

author.org: INRIA, Le Chesnay Cedex, France F-78153#TAB#

paper.abstract: A class of trees occurs both in digital searching and in schemes for maintaining dynamic hash tables. We study the distribution of height in these trees using the saddle point method of complex analysis. As a result, we derive a precise evaluation of the memory requirements of extendible hashing -- a dynamic hashing scheme -- and discuss some related implementation issues.
